TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具 (Visual Designer) 中，為 控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記原始程式碼描述控制會剖析並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 內容類別提供下列功能：The properties of the class provide the following functionality: - 屬性會傳回物件，其通常包含物件，衍生自類別設計工具，在繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 屬性傳回的格式化配置中顯示的資料集合**自動格式化** 對話方塊。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 屬性會傳回欄位相關聯的範本群組集合控制項和最上層範本。The property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control and the top level templates. - 屬性一律會傳回`true`，指出設計工具會建立相關聯的暫存複本控制項以產生設計階段標記。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 類別方法會提供下列功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法繫結相關聯控制項設計階段資料來源。The method binds the associated control to a design-time data source. - 方法會傳回用來呈現關聯的標記在設計階段。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法準備設計工具，以檢視、 編輯和設計關聯。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 呼叫方法時，相關聯的設計階段檢視區域按下。The method is called when a region of the design-time view of the associated is clicked. - 方法時，會呼叫相關聯的資料來源的結構描述變更。The method is called when the schema of the data source of the associated changes. - 方法用來移除或加入其他屬性，或是遮蔽屬性相關聯的。The method is used to remove or add additional properties or to shadow properties of the associated . 中不支援設計階段的可編輯區域控制項，所以和方法沒有任何功能。Design-time editable regions are not supported in the control, so the and methods have no functionality. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 此範例衍生`MyDetailsView`控制項從。The example derives the `MyDetailsView` control from the . `MyDetailsView`是只是一份控制項。The `MyDetailsView` is simply a copy of the control. 此範例也衍生`MyDetailsViewDesigner`類別從，並將物件`MyDetailsViewDesigner`上`MyDetailsView`控制項。The example also derives the `MyDetailsViewDesigner` class from and places a object for `MyDetailsViewDesigner` on the `MyDetailsView` control. `The MyDetailsViewDesigner` 覆寫屬性以指定的設計階段檢視的頁面巡覽區列`MyDetailsView`包含五個的頁面連結。`The MyDetailsViewDesigner` overrides the property to specify that the pager row of the design-time view of the `MyDetailsView` contain five page links. 它會覆寫方法以進行屬性顯示在**屬性**在設計階段的方格。It overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Property** grid at design time. 它會覆寫方法，將包含屬性，如果它已指定，為新的第一個資料列中`MyDetailsView`在設計階段的方格。It overrides the method to include the property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyDetailsView` grid at design time. 如果屬性`MyDetailsView`是或值繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項周圍的藍色虛線外的框。If the property of the `MyDetailsView` is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

value.span: ，其中包含 的預先定義配置。

span.span: A that contains the predefined schemes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的內部類別的 XML 編碼成員中會填入。The is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要繫結至設計階段資料來源的 控制項。

span.span: The control to bind to the design-time data source.

summary.span: 將關聯控制項繫結至設計階段資料來源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法繫結相關聯控制項設計階段資料來源，然後計算的呼叫器和自動產生的資料列所需，依據所指定的功能數目。The method binds the associated control to the design-time data source and calculates the number of pager and automatically generated rows that are required, based on features that are specified for the . `dataBoundControl`參數代表與這個設計工具或該控制項的複本相關聯的控制項。The `dataBoundControl` parameter represents the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯 控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: ，其中包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先，方法會設定屬性控制權傳輸至`true`，如果集合是空的。First, the method sets the property of the control to `true`, if the collection is empty. 然後設定集合控制項空陣列，如果無法取得資料來源的結構描述。The then sets the collection of the control to an empty array if the schema of the data source cannot be obtained. 它會重新整理物件來強制来呼叫的方法。It refreshes the object to force the method to be called. 然後，它會呼叫基底方法，產生標記。It then calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫類別中的方法繼承自類別，以變更的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 範例會將新的第一個資料列加入至方格，將包含屬性，如果定義。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果衍生自控制項的屬性是或值繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項周圍的藍色虛線外的框。If the property of the control that is derived from is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不會變更控制項的執行階段外觀。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法，請務必呼叫基底方法，因為它最後透過數個覆寫層級，會呼叫上控制項或一份要產生標記的控制項。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String

param.name: regions
param.span: ，將會在其中加入控制項設計階段檢視中可選取及可按一下區域的定義。

span.span: A to which to add definitions of the selectable and clickable regions in the design-time view of the control.

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記，並填入設計工具區域的集合。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: ，其中包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法以產生設計階段呈現標記控制項。The method calls the method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. 方法也會填入`regions`與每個可點選或可選取區域的設計階段呈現的物件。The method also populates `regions` with a object for each clickable or selectable region of the design-time rendering. 如，每個資料列中的第一個儲存格為可選取; 資料列中的所有資料格都是可點按。For the , the first cell in each row is selectable; all the cells in the rows are clickable. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫繼承自一個類別中的方法類別，以變更的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 範例會將新的第一個資料列加入至方格，將包含屬性，如果定義。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果衍生自控制項的屬性是或值繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項周圍的藍色虛線外的框。If the property of the control that is derived from the is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不會變更控制項的執行階段外觀。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法，確定呼叫基底方法或多載，因為它們最後幾個覆寫層級，透過呼叫上控制項或一份要產生標記的控制項。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method or the overload because they eventually, through several override levels, call on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項功能目前不提供。This functionality is not currently available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , control which implements an .

summary.span: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式呼叫方法準備好要用來呈現的設計工具時控制項。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 和其基底的方法設定屬性和設定事件所需的設計工具的作業。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`參數代表與這個設計工具或一份該控制項相關聯的控制項。The `component` parameter represents the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClick(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnClick (e As DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: ，定義控制項的被按一下的區域。

span.span: A that defines the clicked region of the control.

summary.span: 在關聯控制項之設計階段檢視的某個區域上按一下時呼叫。

span.span: Called when a region of the design-time view for the associated control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法儲存所選資料區域的索引，並更新呈現標記設計介面上的控制項。The method saves the selected region index and updates the markup that renders the control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 當關聯控制項的資料來源結構描述變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非在設計工具處於樣板編輯模式或欄位為已加入或編輯，方法呼叫方法中，依序呼叫方法，以更新以反映資料來源變更的控制項。Unless the designer is in template editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 集合，實作已加入和已遮蔽屬性的 。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 方格的顯示畫面中，移除或加入屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制設計工具使用衍生自方法方法来遮蔽各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並將屬性加入到或從其中移除屬性`Properties`方格。Control designers use methods derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the `Properties` grid. 如控制項，方法會設定物件屬性`false`於範本模式下控制項時。For the control, the method sets the object of the property to `false` when the control is in template mode. 這可確保無法使用來刪除於範本模式下的資料行`Fields` 對話方塊。This ensures that a column that is in template mode cannot be deleted using the `Fields` dialog box. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫繼承自一個類別中的方法類別，以變更`Properties`方格控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the `Properties` grid of the control at design time. 此範例可讓屬性顯示在`Properties`方格。The example makes the property visible in the `Properties` grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#3)]

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性加入到或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property SampleRowCount As Integer
protected: virtual property int SampleRowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得要讓關聯控制項顯示的範例資料列數。

span.span: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.

value.span: 要顯示的範例資料列數。

span.span: The number of sample rows to show.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性一律會傳回數字`2`。The property always returns the number `2`. 這會導致顯示的頁面巡覽區列中的兩個頁面連結控制項在設計階段。This causes two page links to be displayed in the pager row of the control at design time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫類別中的屬性繼承自類別若要變更的頁面巡覽區列中顯示的頁面連結數目控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the property in a class inherited from the class to change the number of page links appearing in the pager row of the control at design time. 此範例會顯示五個頁面連結。The example causes five page links to be displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#2)]

summary.span: 針對關聯控制項設計階段檢視的可編輯區域，指定內容。

span.span: Specifies content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法沒有任何功能，則不支援在設計階段檢視的可編輯區域控制項。The method has no functionality; there is no support for editable regions in the design-time view of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 針對關聯控制項的欄位，取得範本群組的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: ，其中包含 控制項中每個範本欄位的項目。

span.span: A containing an element for each templated field in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性建構的集合物件，一個用於每個樣板化的資料欄位，每個控制項中的欄位 （例如頁首、 頁尾和頁面巡覽區） 相關聯的其中一個控制項。The property constructs a collection of objects, one for each templated data field and one for each control field (such as header, footer, and pager) in the associated control. 資料欄位元素具有的每個預先定義的資料列範本類型的物件。The data field elements have a object for each of the predefined row template types. 控制欄位元素包含單一。The control field elements contain a single .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，該值指出設計工具是否應該使用暫存複本來產生設計階段標記，而非使用與設計工具相關聯的實際控制項。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy, rather than the actual control associated with the designer, to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為屬性一律會是`true`，設計工具會使用包含一份相關聯的控制項控制項以產生設計階段標記。Because the property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控制項不會影響任何持續性。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果屬性覆寫以傳回`false`，設計師會使用相關聯控制其本身，以產生設計階段標記。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated control itself to generate the design-time markup.

para.span: 您可以覆寫屬性，以傳回或要判定其是否標示控制項類別層級為基礎的值物件。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level object.

para.span: 如果未覆寫，物件會忽略。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the object ignores the .
